title: so much salt
body:
[10:50] PENTAKRILL: im muting you. i think you are to young to be playing league
[10:50] johnnyblueballs: im 20
hahahaha
i think you need to grow up %%%%
[10:50] PENTAKRILL:  lol
[10:51] johnnyblueballs: honestly you're acting like you've never insulted anybody before
[10:51] PENTAKRILL: you are way to old to be putting down a 16 year old. yo utell me to grow up
yet you are the one needing to grow up 
[10:51] johnnyblueballs: HAHAHA this game's universal
for all ages
they have a chat bar and reporting for a reason
[10:51] PENTAKRILL: i meant mental level of age.... 
[10:51] johnnyblueballs: sus dunkeys vid g

replies.body: looks like the thread got nuked. like most of these threads without full context its hard to vote one way or the other. Guy comes off like a bit of tool though.

i was talking to him. and i said come comment on the post..... he didnt come post cause i was right. i sent him the link 

also this is what he said after http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/Fs8M7dZs-rage-after-ranked-should-be-ban
so you antagonized him, he responded, and you run here to make a thread. Rito should ban you, then people like him want get baited into being pissed off
